revised_title: Crystal Structure and Electrical Properties of Bipyridylium Tetracyanoquinodimethane
tldr: The article reports on the crystal structure, conductivity, and thermoelectric power of the bipyridylium-tetracyanoquinodimethane (TCNQ) complex. The complex crystallizes in the monoclinic system, and its anisotropic electrical data are discussed in terms of the crystal structure. A band model approach to conduction is suggested, with phonon scattering of charge carriers within a two-dimensional TCNQ lattice.
